description:
After Bandit Keith’s Machine deck forces Jonouchi to take the defensive, Jonouchi mimics Keith’s battle strategy to metalicize his Red-Eyes B. Dragon!  Is victory assured, or does the cheater Bandit Keith literally have one last card up his sleeve?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Toki o Koero! Red Eyes Black Metal Dragon
Transcend Time! Red-Eyes Black Metal Dragon
時を超えろ! レッドアイズ・ブラックメタルドラゴン
